action.description: The actions that the response plan starts at the beginning of an incident.

arn.description: The ARN of the response plan.

chatChannels.description: The Chatbot chat channel used for collaboration during an incident.

displayName.description: The long format of the response plan name. This field can contain spaces.

engagements.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the contacts and escalation plans that the response plan engages during an incident.

integration.description: Information about third-party services integrated into the response plan. The following values are supported:

name.description: The name of the response plan.

tags.description: The tags applied to the response plan.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

integration.description: Information about third-party services integrated into the response plan. The following values are supported:

name.description: The name of the response plan.

tags.description: The tags applied to the response plan.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering ResponsePlan resources.
